HttpHeader & headerRef

Detailed Description

The Global Request Object. Handles GET/POST/COOKIE Requests Holds a non-const referencs to the global HTTPHeader Object in headerRef private member variable

Author:
Neel Basu <neel>

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Request::Request ( HttpHeader &  headerRefObj  ) 

Path Info from parent Class.

Initializes the HTTP Header Object initializes get, post, cookie member variables by invoking __getParams(), __postParams(), and __cookieParams()

References __cookieParams(), __getParams(), __postParams(), cookie, pathInfo, and post.
